ygData.subject: Digest Number 27
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, good races can sell very close to Cazic Thule. Not a lot of people know the Rathe Mountain zone well, but vendors are located there, both good and
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, good races can sell very close to Cazic Thule. Not a lot of
people know the Rathe Mountain zone well, but vendors are located there,
both good and evil, plus at least one that will sell to both.

Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~



Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
>As a reminder, you can get FS weapons in cazic thule, they are better than
regular weapons, and players will sell real cheap because any of the "good"
races and the casters can't sell anywhere near by. FS sells for 4 pp at
stores, so you can offer that and!
have your choice of weapons.<
